questions: CNG (Compressed Natural Gas) in automobiles can reduce pollution in cities. What could be the correct reason for the same?
option1: It produces less amount of Sulphur dioxide and chlorine.
option2: It does not leave any residue or smoke after burning in the engine.
option3: It produces a large amount of carbon dioxide
option4: It is used in compressed form
